Train your brain

That’s not just a catchy slogan. It’s our reason for existing. You can now help your employees achieve healthier brains, enabling them to perform at their peak, at work and in life. Welcome to better brain health, for all.

Watch the video

We’re bringing employee well-being into sharp focus

Brain health has never been considered more important than it is right now. Research estimates global losses of around $1 trillion a year due to anxiety and depression alone, and over $16 trillion between 2010 and 2030 due to mental health conditions as a whole.

In the corporate world, we’re talking more than ever about the link between well-being and productivity – while still grappling with the impact of stress and burnout. Well-being programs that kick-in at crisis points are simply ineffective. And around the world, millions of employees are struggling, forcing organizations to cope with the fallout of absences and low productivity.

Your people are your business, our business is their brain health

Helping people learn how to use their brains more effectively is at the very heart of what we do. With the right tools, your employees can realize and achieve their full potential. Supporting better brain health is the key to building and sustaining a high-performance culture that doesn’t cost you your people. Improving brain health equips and empowers your people with the tools to manage stress, develop resilience, and reap the wide-ranging rewards of healthier behaviors.

Because healthy brains = a healthy bottom line

Improving brain health isn’t only good for your teams, it’s also great for business. Healthier brains can lead to clearer thinking and sharper focus on what really matters, with employees working better as team members whether remote or on-site. At HPS Brain Gym™ our mission is clear: We help employees train and build healthier brains to perform at their very best.

The result? Employees feel better, and productivity goes up.

HPS Brain Gym™ in action

And it’s all backed by science

We’ve worked in this space for decades. The HPS Brain Gym™ program has been created by healthcare professionals who specialize in psychology, psychiatry, and neuroscience. Through years of research and clinical practice, we’ve witnessed first-hand the impact of brain health promotion and prevention methods on overall well-being and productivity – no matter who you are.

Did you know the World Health Organization (WHO) officially recognized burnout as a new medical condition 5 years ago? For far too many, this growing occupational phenomenon is a reality. We’re here to not just beat burnout, but to prevent it.

See the science

Beat burnout with HPS Brain Gym™

HPS Brain Gym™ is the personal trainer corporate America needs to get and stay brain-fit for the future. Give your employees a sustainable high-performance culture that’s built to last by building healthier brains, with the right tools.
